alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 24 at 8:53AM CDT until August 24 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT THIS MORNING FOR LEAKE, MADISON AND NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 853 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 6 and 10 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Canton, Philadelphia, Carthage, Edinburg, Pearl River, Neshoba, Tuscola, Singleton, Renfroe, Thomastown, Madden, Dowdville, Farmhaven, Camden, Dixon, Cameron, Sharon, Burnside, Stallo and Way. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
